chinese:
Natural Science is the science of studying organic or inorganic things in nature. Natural Science includes astronomy, physics, chemistry, earth science, biology, medicine, etc.

Different from natural sciences, there are also application science, human literature, social science, form science and engineering. Whether psychology and geography are natural sciences. At present, controversy is currently controversial. It is generally widely accepted to include both natural sciences and social sciences.

It is generally believed that ancient Greek Tayles, Aristotle is the founder of natural science, Galileo Galilele is the first to introduce experiments to natural science. In the 18th century, European natural sciences and philosophy were almost unable to separate. Philosophers are also natural scientists, Lie Cartes, Gottfried William Leibnitz, John Rock, etc. also is also natural scientists. In the early days of natural science development, a systematic study on natural objects or classifications, called Natural History, Latino Historia Naturalis. [1]

The fundamental purpose of natural science is to look for the law behind the natural phenomenon, but the work of natural science does not include these regularities. Natural science believes that supernatural, casual and self-contradictory phenomena does not exist. The most important two pillars of natural science are observational and logical reasoning. Natural science can guide the laws of nature from natural sciences. If the phenomenon of observation is different from the law of the law, then it is either because there is a mistake in the observation, or because it is considered to be the correct rules to be wrong. A supernatural factor does not exist.
